q: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Wealth is the ability to fully experience life.
Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
Money is only a tool. It will take you wherever you wish, but it will not replace you as the driver.
Your time is limited, don't waste it living someone else's life.
The harder you work for something, the greater you'll feel when you achieve it.
Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
A goal is a dream with a deadline.
Too many of us are not living our dreams because we are living our fears.
The successful warrior is the average man, with laser-like focus.
It's not about money. It's about the people you have, how you're led, and how much you get it.
Dream big and dare to fail.
I find that the harder I work, the more luck I seem to have.
Formal education will make you a living; self-education will make you a fortune.
What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
Rich people have small TVs and big libraries, and poor people have small libraries and big TVs.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
The best revenge is massive success.
An investment in knowledge pays the best interest.
If you really look closely, most overnight successes took a long time.
Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
Money often costs too much.
The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
Time is money.
I attribute my success to this: I never gave or took any excuse.
The real test is not whether you avoid this failure, because you won't. It's whether you let it harden or shame you into inaction, or whether you learn from it.
A successful man is one who can lay a firm foundation with the bricks others have thrown at him.
Wealth consists not in having great possessions, but in having few wants.
If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
The difference between ordinary and extraordinary is that little extra.
Happiness is not in the mere possession of money; it lies in the joy of achievement, in the thrill of creative effort.
Try not to become a man of success. Rather become a man of value.
All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them.
The stock market is filled with individuals who know the price of everything, but the value of nothing.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
Success seems to be connected with action. Successful people keep moving. They make mistakes, but they don't quit.
I'd rather be optimistic and a fool than pessimistic and right.
Don't let the fear of losing be greater than the excitement of winning.
The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.
Wealth is largely the result of habit.
Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
To succeed in life, you need two things: ignorance and confidence.
